properties.name: ball.application.warmup-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the warmup process on application startup. When enabled, all registered WarmupTask beans will be executed in parallel during application startup.

properties.name: ball.application.warmup-timeout-seconds
properties.description: Timeout in seconds for the entire warmup process. If warmup tasks do not complete within this time, they will be interrupted.

values.description: Enable warmup tasks execution on startup.
Disable warmup tasks execution on startup.
